featured.text: By sharing knowledge and information, the different sectors are able to come up with improved processing and handling, through which creation of various innovative products was made possible.
By 1955, he had completed an improved version of the product, with each square inch of material containing 300 hooks, which made it stay fastened and yet easy enough to pull apart when needed.

definition.en_def: Made better or enhanced in quality, value, or condition.
definition.example: The new software version has improved features that enhance user experience.
